dict.acceptation: 真正的；坦率的，真诚的；血统纯粹的，纯种的；[医学]真性的；

sent.orig: Your genuine action will explain itself and will explain your other genuine actions.
sent.trans: 你真正的行为会不言自明，且解释你其他的行为。

sent.orig: She wanted a genuine opinion; a genuine opinion watered to her.
sent.trans: 她需要真诚的意见；真诚的意见对她关系重大。

sent.orig: There are three kinds of patriotism, genuine patriotism, sham patriotism, and half-genuine and half-sham, vacillating, patriotism.
sent.trans: 爱国主义有三种：一种是真爱国主义，一种是假爱国主义，一种是半真半假、动摇的爱国主义。

sent.orig: Diode rectifier to produce environmentally-friendly series of genuine commitment: genuine environmental standards.
sent.trans: 生产环保正品整流二极管系列，绝对环保正品。

sent.orig: But let's argue over genuine differences – over ideas and policies.
sent.trans: 但我们应该就真正的异见而辩论——例如不同的想法和政策。
